articles.title: Meta Rebuffs Google's Virtual Reality Tie-Up Proposal: Report - NDTV
articles.description: Meta Platforms decided against a partnership with Alphabet to use Google's Android XR platform for its virtual and mixed-reality Quest headsets, The Information reported on Friday.
articles.content:
Meta is talking to hardware companies about building new VR devices, said the report (Representational)
